product_name: Canari Echelon Bike Shorts - Men's- 2012 Closeout
long_description: The men's Canari Echelon Bike Shorts offer superior comfort and an 8-panel fit. Choose these shorts for long rides where comfort is a must. Polyester/spandex blend fabric wicks moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. 8-panel construction. Built-in, seamless molded chamois provides padded comfort for long stretches in the saddle. Flatlock seams offer flexibility and comfort. Silicone grippers at cuffs keep the Canari Echelon Bike Shorts from riding up; drawcord waistband ensures a perfect fit. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Canari Echelon Bike Shorts offer superior comfort and an 8-panel fit. Choose these shorts for long rides where comfort is a must.
